quote: Every experience is a lesson. Every loss is a gain. – Sathya Sai Baba
fact: In 1986 Congress & President Ronald Reagan signed Public Law 99-359, which changed Daylight Saving Time from the last Sunday in April to the first Sunday in April.  It was estimated to save the nation about 300,000 barrels of oil each year by adding most of the month April to D.S.T.
tip: Use keyboard shortcuts to save time.
joke: My wife told me to rub the herbs on the meat for better flavor. That's sage advice.
